variable.name: SUBJID
variable.comment: Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52

variable.name: SEX
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C44177 NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: RACE
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C17049 NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

variable.name: YEAR_BIRTH
variable.comment: Group patients > 89 years of age into one decile denoted as 90

variable.name: HEART_RATE
variable.description: Heart rate from first normal electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2644397 (Public ID)

variable.name: QRS_COMPLEX_DURATION
variable.description: QRS Duration from first normal electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: SNOMED; source ID: 251208001

variable.name: QTCB
variable.description: QT interval, corrected for heart rate via Bazett's formula, from first normal electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C62112

variable.name: ECG_IMPRESSION_TEXT
variable.description: Cardiologist-generated free-text impression from first normal electrocardiogram

variable.name: AGE_FIRST_ECG
variable.description: Patient's age at the time of the first electrocardiogram

variable.name: TYPE_2_DIABETES
variable.description: Diabetes status, as determined by the Northwestern T2D algorithm
variable.comment: Indication could be from a diagnosis code, medications, or lab values. External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C26747 NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.
variable.value: Uncertain or otherwise excluded as a case or a control; not enough information

variable.name: AGE_TYPE_2_DIABETES
variable.description: Age at the earliest indication of diabetes

variable.name: ABNORMAL_CARDIAC_CONDUCTION
variable.description: Conduction abnormalities status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: SNOMED; source ID: 36358004

variable.name: CONGESTIVE_HEART_FAILURE
variable.description: Congestive heart failure status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C3080

variable.name: ARRHYTHMIA
variable.description: Arrhythmia status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C2881

variable.name: LEFT_VENTRICULAR_HYPERTROPHY
variable.description: Left Ventricular Hypertrophy status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C50631

variable.name: RIGHT_VENTRICULAR_HYPERTROPHY
variable.description: Right Ventricular Hypertrophy status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C50734

variable.name: CORONARY_ARTERY_DISEASE
variable.description: Any evidence of CAD, including bypass surgery and myocardial infarction or ischemia
variable.comment: External variable resource: SNOMED; source ID: 53741008

variable.name: CARDIOMYOPATHY
variable.description: Cardiomyopathy status at the time of the first electrocardiogram
variable.comment: External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C34830
